name: Overcraft
description:
Overcraft is a collectible card game. Earn Ink to craft cards and unlock Research. Collect all 150 cards.

No microtransactions. No pay to win.

How to Play:
1. Click +Ink to collect a random amount of Ink.
2. Craft random cards for 500 Ink each.
3. There are 30 common (grey), 30 uncommon (green), 30 rare (blue), 30 very rare (purple) and 30 extremely rare (orange) cards to collect.
4. Spend Ink on Research to collect more Ink and unlock rarer cards.
5. Research Automatic +Ink to collect Ink over time while playing.
6. Exchange three duplicate cards of the same rarity to craft a specific card for 25,000 Ink.
7. After all cards of the same rarity are collected, recycle duplicate cards of that rarity for Ink.
8. Collect all 150 cards.
